subsection.title: Create a new project from importing existing projects

item.p: You can create a new project by importing an existing Mingle project. Assuming you have already exported the Mingle project, you can click the Import project link on the Current projects page (the first page you see after installation or logging on - click the Mingle logo to display this page).
Choose the project export file and provide a project name and identifier.
Click the 'Import project' link to complete the project creation.

subsection.note: Any users in the imported project that don't already exist in your Mingle instance will be created. User passwords are not exported with a project. Therefore, a Mingle administrator will need to create a new password for these newly created users on the manage users page, unless you use external authentication such as LDAP.
